abstract: Conservative Republicans are threatening to shut down government amid pledge to reject any spending bill that does not cut off funds for Planned Parenthood; point to videos alleging group sells fetal tissue for medical research; is latest example of ardent conservatives threatening shut down unless their policies are advanced.
lead_paragraph: The vow by some Republicans to reject a spending bill that includes funds for Planned Parenthood is their latest attempt to affect policy by threatening to shut the government.

headline.main: Taking Aim at Planned Parenthood, Conservatives Use Familiar Tactic
headline.print_headline: Taking Aim at Planned Parenthood, Conservatives Use a Familiar Tactic

snippet: The vow by some Republicans to reject a spending bill that includes funds for Planned Parenthood is their latest attempt to affect policy by threatening to shut the government.
